backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods or logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping three Valentine-related features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of each frontend file in the Valentine's app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-driven global stylesheet defining Valentine-themed color tokens, dark mode values, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the React Valentine app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component coordinating the intro overlay, hero section, animations, one‑liners, and surprise reveal.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Floati: Generates floating heart emoji animations with reduced‑motion handling.
frontend/src/components/valentine/RosePe: Creates animated falling rose petals with randomized motion and a static fallback for reduced‑motion users.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Rotati: Cycles through playful Valentine one‑liners with pause‑on‑hover and accessibility support.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Surpri: Handles a clickable gift animation that reveals a Valentine coupon book with fun redeemable items.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Valent: Interactive Valentine intro overlay with a moving 'No' button and an accept callback, using motion preferences and touch/mouse tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity auth state, login flow, and stored identities using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom Valentine-themed color variables, typography, and component utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entrypoint that mounts the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and Valentine theme variables with plugin support.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, requirements, and current state of the Valentine website.
